title: 520 RP Skins Question
body: Do 520 RP skins go on sale?

replies.body: Simply put, yes they should! Though I can't guarantee when any particular skin you're looking for will be on sale, there should be moments where they are. For example, Spooky Gangplank is on sale right now! :D

Speaking of sales, is there ever going to be another RP sale?
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/aAE77dmu-are-there-going-to-be-a-rp-sale-for-this-christmas?comment=0000

There has been no communication, ever, of them not coming back, but for some reason, such a sale being held each pre-season has just stopped happening.
